description: The Meme Universe Comes to Hong Kong! More Than a Game. A Meme 3.0 Ecosystem. RealGo is a Meme 3.0 game that serves as the infrastructure layer for meme native experiences, bringing gameplay, community, and on chain utility together in one place. Join us for an intimate evening of premium drinks, curated bites, and high-signal conversations with leading meme projects, Web3 founders, investors, and ecosystem partners, set in the heart of Lan Kwai Fong.
